50  static double goal_pos_change_threshold() { return replanner::PARAM_pos_change_threshold; }

56  static double goal_vel_change_threshold() { return replanner::PARAM_vel_change_threshold; }
57 
63  static RJ::Seconds partial_replan_lead_time() {
64  return RJ::Seconds(replanner::PARAM_partial_replan_lead_time);
65  }
66 
67 private:
68  // Attempt a partial replan, and use it only if it is faster.
69  static Trajectory check_better(const PlanParams& params,
70  Trajectory previous);
71 
72  // Replan part of the trajectory, re-using the first
73  // `partial_replan_lead_time()` of the previous trajectory.
74  static Trajectory partial_replan(const PlanParams& params,
75  const Trajectory& previous);
76 
77  // Replan from the start without a previous trajectory.
78  static Trajectory full_replan(const PlanParams& params);
79 
80  // Whether the trajectory has deviated from the path and requires a replan.
81  static bool veered_off_path(const Trajectory& trajectory, RobotInstant actual,
82  RJ::Time now);
83 
84  // Whether the goal has changed past the `goal_pos_change_threshold()`.
85  static bool goal_changed(const LinearMotionInstant& prev_goal,
86  const LinearMotionInstant& goal);
87 
88  // Get the partial path starting at `now`, plus the partial replan lead time
89  // duration.
90  static Trajectory partial_path(const Trajectory& prev_trajectory,
91  RJ::Time now) {
92  RJ::Time end_time = now + RJ::Seconds(replanner::PARAM_partial_replan_lead_time);
93  return prev_trajectory.sub_trajectory(prev_trajectory.begin_time(),
94  end_time);
95  }
96 
97  static constexpr RJ::Seconds kCheckBetterDeltaTime = 0.2s;
98 };
